text: "You Make Me Feel Like Dancing" is a song credited to English/Australian singer Leo Sayer, taken from his 1976 album Endless Flight. The song reached number one on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart, making it his first number-one single in the United States, and reached number 2 on the UK Singles Chart. Billboard ranked it as the No. 13 song of 1977. Credited songwriters Sayer and Vini Poncia won a Grammy Award for the song in 1978 in the category Best R&B; Song. Category:1976 songs Category:Leo Sayer songs
title: You Make Me Feel Like Dancing
